author: Joseph Zucker
title: Philadelphia Union Announce Unnamed Player Tested Positive for Coronavirus
description: A member of the  Philadelphia Union  tested positive for COVID-19, the team announced Wednesday.  "The Union medical staff has been working directly with Crozer-Keystone Health System ...
content:
Victor Decolongon/Getty Images
A member of the Philadelphia Union tested positive for COVID-19, the team announced Wednesday.
